system.requirements: Tier 3; Luminen Shock/Capacitors, Mechanicus Implants. Aptitudes: Ballistic Skill, Tech, Unaligned
system.effect:
Character can use their Luminen Capacitors to make a ranged attack: Half Action Ballistic Skill Test (counts as Single Attack Action). Character must then pass a Toughness Test or gain a level of Fatigue.
Profile: 1d10+2xWP Bonus Energy Damage, 0 Penetration, Shock Quality.
